title: What Is The Treatment For Coronavirus?
author: Outlook Bureau
description: Here are the treatments being tried out for coronavirus across the globe—many are not backed by scientific evidence while others are downright harmful.
cleaned_text: There is no cure or vaccine for coronavirus. So far, there is no consensus on a treatment protocol either. Once infected, the treatment is largely supportive, based on managing symptoms. Many proposals are in the air or the lab—in the exploratory stage, trial stage or real-time in-vivo experiments on patients. Some proposed medicines, such as hydroxychloroquine, have been highly controversial. Here are the treatments being tried out across the globe—many are not backed by scientific evidence while others are downright harmful. The list, therefore is descriptive rather than prescriptive.
